parameters.name: Bucket
parameters.description: The name of the bucket for which to get the notification configuration. When you use this API operation with an access point, provide the alias of the access point in place of the bucket name. When you use this API operation with an Object Lambda access point, provide the alias of the Object Lambda access point in place of the bucket name. If the Object Lambda access point alias in a request is not valid, the error code InvalidAccessPointAliasError is returned. For more information about InvalidAccessPointAliasError, see List of Error Codes.

nested_items.name: TopicConfiguration
nested_items.description: This data type is deprecated. A container for specifying the configuration for publication of messages to an Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) topic when Amazon S3 detects specified events.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: An optional unique identifier for configurations in a notification configuration. If you don't provide one, Amazon S3 will assign an ID.

nested_items.name: Events
nested_items.description: A collection of events related to objects.

nested_items.name: Event
nested_items.description: Bucket event for which to send notifications.

nested_items.name: Topic
nested_items.description: Amazon SNS topic to which Amazon S3 will publish a message to report the specified events for the bucket.

nested_items.name: QueueConfiguration
nested_items.description: This data type is deprecated. This data type specifies the configuration for publishing messages to an Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS) queue when Amazon S3 detects specified events.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: An optional unique identifier for configurations in a notification configuration. If you don't provide one, Amazon S3 will assign an ID.

nested_items.name: Event
nested_items.description: The bucket event for which to send notifications.

nested_items.name: Events
nested_items.description: A collection of bucket events for which to send notifications.

nested_items.name: Queue
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon SQS queue to which Amazon S3 publishes a message when it detects events of the specified type.

nested_items.name: CloudFunctionConfiguration
nested_items.description: Container for specifying the Lambda notification configuration.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: An optional unique identifier for configurations in a notification configuration. If you don't provide one, Amazon S3 will assign an ID.

nested_items.name: Event
nested_items.description: The bucket event for which to send notifications.

nested_items.name: Events
nested_items.description: Bucket events for which to send notifications.

nested_items.name: CloudFunction
nested_items.description: Lambda cloud function ARN that Amazon S3 can invoke when it detects events of the specified type.

nested_items.name: InvocationRole
nested_items.description: The role supporting the invocation of the Lambda function.
